netpol_patch:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: payments-api-default-deny-ingress
  namespace: payments
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: payments-api
  ingress: []
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
podsec_patch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: payments-api-778b99cbdd
  namespace: payments
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
summary: Added a NetworkPolicy to deny all ingress traffic to the payments-api pod by default, and hardened the pod's security context to adhere to the restricted Pod Security Standard by setting runAsNonRoot=true and seccompProfile=RuntimeDefault.
